original_text: Its water will come as a flood into Judah. It will cover the land and it will rise as high as people's necks! He will make his wings very wide to cover all your land, Immanuel.’
korean_text: 흘러 유다에 들어와서 가득하여 목에까지 미치리라 임마누엘이여 그가 펴는 날개가 네 땅에 가득하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Its water will come as a flood into Judah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 물이 홍수처럼 유다로 들어올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and it will rise as high as people's necks!
He will make his wings very wide
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 날개를 매우 넓게 펼칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: to cover all your land, Immanuel.'
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 모든 땅을 덮기 위함이라, 임마누엘.'
